issue.title: [Rust] Implement Array::memory_size()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9582](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9582). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to be able to determine how much memory is being used by Arrow Arrays so that I can better monitor and report on memory usage when profiling and tuning code.
